item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
item.dc:creator: @LawGamer LawGamer
item.description:
@LawGamer wrote:

Hello, all help would be greatly appreciated. I notice this is the only crash left on my server, 6 months ago it was czar, but I’ve been working on it since. I can’t seem to find an error. So I copied the error, and posted under here.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.SpecDamg(client.java:613) at client.process(client.java:14415) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:140) at server.main(server.java:53)

Now, as it says SpecDamg, I knew this was the root of the problem, and it ALWAYS points me to me this line

   if(p != null)

Now here is the whole SpecDamg void.

[code]public void SpecDamg(int maxDamage) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == false ) {
int damage = misc.random(maxDamage);
if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0)
damage = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[3];
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = damage;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
}

[/code]

Now for the 2nd error, the error on the next error code the EXACT line it leads me to is:

SpecDamgNPC(25);

Here is the full code:

if((IsAttackingNPC) && DDS2Damg == true && DDStimer == 0) { SpecDamgNPC(25); DDS2Damg = false; } if(IsAttacking == true && DDS2Damg == true && DDStimer == 0) { SpecDamg(25); DDS2Damg = false; }

I’ve messed around numerous times, and I feel this happens when someone attacks a player, at the same time they’re dead, so it is quite rare, but there are around 50-80 users on my server at a time, at least 50% of which are pking, so this happens quite a bit. If anyone can help, or give advice, it would be greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
